home.parrafo-info: Detail-oriented .NET & Flutter Developer with hands-on experience in backend API development, frontend integration with Flutter, and team leadership in client-facing projects. Skilled in C#, ASP.NET, SQL Server, and Git. Proven ability to manage external projects, review pull requests, and collaborate with cross-functional teams. Passionate about building scalable solutions that solve real business problems.

sobre-mi.title: About Me
sobre-mi.texto_sobreMi:
Systems Engineer graduated from Universidad Fid√©litas in Costa Rica, with specialized technical training in software development from the Instituto Nacional de Aprendizaje (INA). During two years of technical studies, I completed my professional internship as a .NET developer at Grupo Empresarial Datasoft and Global Teams, where I consolidated my skills in real productive environments.

I have worked as a full-stack developer on remote projects for companies such as NetForemost Inc., 7Card, and Versatec, actively participating in the design, development, and implementation of technological solutions. I am proficient in technologies such as .NET, Entity Framework, Flutter (with Bloc pattern), C#, SQL Server, Firebase, PostgreSQL, and Google Cloud, among others.

I have also developed complete payment integrations using Stripe.

Additionally, I have held technical leadership roles, coordinating development teams, reviewing pull requests, and ensuring quality and efficiency in delivering scalable solutions that address real business needs.

proyectos.title: Projects
proyectos.info-proyecto1: Web application for educational management for centers, developed in React.js with a MariaDB database and connected to a server via an API.
proyectos.info-proyecto2: Dental appointment management system in C# (WinForms) and SQL Server.
proyectos.info-proyecto3: Point of sale system for restaurants in C# and SQL Server, with a web application in React for real-time management.
proyectos.info-proyecto4: Backend training challenge with Java and Spring from the ONE program: develop the backend of a forum for Alura Latam, where students, teachers, and moderators can interact through questions and answers.
